Thanks again - you all know so much more than I do at this stage.

Posts.Title: Am I allowed to join - or would you prefer this group to be just patients...

Posts.Content: Hi everybody, just to explain, I'm in a proper pickle with my emotions today as my twin told me yesterday she is going in for a lumpectomy on Thursday.  Probably looking at radiotherapy thereafter.   She is so precious to me and I feel so lost as to how to a) help her and b) help myself through this.  I'm a mess and I need to get some answers as soon as I can - I'm one of those who needs as much information as possible to help me cope. If there is somewhere else I should be posting, please let me know.  Don't want anyone to feel uncomfortable. Thanks for any replies.
